name: in memory for debug
func:
msg.payload.topic = msg.topic

msg.deviceName = msg.topic.split("/")[3]

flow.set("last_msg_" + msg.deviceName, msg.payload)

return msg;

msg.payload = flow.get("last_msg_" + deviceName)

name: func
func
all 13 devices
func:
msg.deviceNames = [
    "eui-24############43",   // milesight
    "eui-35############05",   // desk
    "eui-35############05",   // desk
    "eui-36############14",   // desk
    "eui-34############16",   // comfort
    "eui-39############13",   // comfort
    "eui-33############08",   // presence
    "eui-33############08",   // presence
    "eui-36############19",   // presence
    "eui-33############09",   // presence
    "eui-30############02",   // peoplecounter
    "eui-70############d5",   // vicki
    "eui-70############93",   // vicki
]

for (const [index, deviceName] of msg.deviceNames.entries()) {
    var msgOut = {}
    msgOut.payload = flow.get("last_msg_" + deviceName)
    msgOut.topic = msgOut.payload.topic
    msgOut.delay = 500 + index * 1000
    node.send([null, msgOut])
}

return [msg, null];

info:

https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/switch/
